entry.title: WIND WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Natashquan

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 4:43 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening then to 70 gusting to 100. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
